title: How to Draw an Angry Bird (Emotions)

steps.title: Start with the head.
steps.content: Start with the head. Draw a circle, but do not finish drawing the top of it.

steps.title: Draw a rounded edge triangle for the top-half of the beak.
steps.content: Draw a rounded edge triangle for the top-half of the beak.

steps.title: Draw a little hill under the top-half of the beak.
steps.content: Draw a little hill under the top-half of the beak.

steps.title: Draw a small upside-down triangle on the bottom of the top of the hill, and then another on the top of the hill.
steps.content: Draw a small upside-down triangle on the bottom of the top of the hill, and then another on the top of the hill.

steps.title: Draw two half ovals for the eyes and then another pair of half squares, but color them this time.
steps.content: Draw two half ovals for the eyes and then another pair of half squares, but color them this time.

steps.title: Draw two bulky mean eyebrows, the tail feathers and a head feather to complete your angry bird.
steps.content: Draw two bulky mean eyebrows, the tail feathers and a head feather to complete your angry bird.

steps.title: Color him in as you like.
steps.content: Color him in as you like. Enjoy!

steps.title: Draw a triangular shape with rounded edges for the body.
steps.content: Draw a triangular shape with rounded edges for the body.

steps.title: Draw slanted rectangles for the eyebrows.
steps.content: Draw slanted rectangles for the eyebrows.

steps.title: Draw a couple of circles with smaller circles inside each one for the eyes.
steps.content: Draw a couple of circles with smaller circles inside each one for the eyes.

steps.title: Draw a diamond shape with rounded edges; draw a zigzag inside to complete the beak.
steps.content: Draw a diamond shape with rounded edges; draw a zigzag inside to complete the beak.

steps.title: Draw a series of pointed curves for the hair.
steps.content: Draw a series of pointed curves for the hair.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the details of the Angry Bird.
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the details of the Angry Bird.
